
## Flow

```{r flow, echo = FALSE}
# expects parameters file1, file2, type1, type2
f1 = read_f(file1, type1)
f2 = read_f(file2, type2)
f.diff = diff_f(f1, f2)
f.rmse.station = rmse_f(f.diff, "Station")
f.rmse.time = rmse_f(f.diff, "Time")

f.diff %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Station, y = diff_f) + geom_boxplot() +
  ylab("Difference") +
  ggtitle("Flow Differences at Stations")
f.rmse.station %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Station, y = rmse_f) +
  geom_col() + ylab("RMSE") +
  ggtitle("Flow RMSE at Stations")
f.rmse.time %>% mutate(Time = as.POSIXct(Time, format = "%d%b%Y %M:%S",
    tz = "UTC")) %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Time, y = rmse_f) + geom_line() +
  scale_x_datetime(date_labels = "%b %Y") + 
  ylab("RMSE") +
  ggtitle("Flow RMSE Through Time")
```
